data.name: Ultrasclash V
data.detailed_description:
UltrasClash V is a physics based, fast paced, high octane anime combat!!! Fight hordes of hostile and powerful enemies like cactus head policemen, stupid minionsand giant dinosaur in a desperate, yet unmistakably hilarious, fight for survival.

In Ultrasclash V the combat is limited only by your own creativity. Choose your fighting style, choose your weapons, chose you powers. Be the powerful fighter you always dreamed of becoming!

STORY
The world is destroyed by a cataclysm: the only thing left is the tower-stadium called Motivatower. Only the one who reach the top will obtain any wish, save the heroes to let help your way!


FEATURES
üëäPunch Movement System: we created a VR locomotion system which allows you to roam the map using your fists, punching in the direction you choose to move to!


‚ö°Ô∏èSpecial Attacks: Charge up your aura to full power and unleash devastating finishing moves.


‚òÑÔ∏èPhysical engine: we bring you accurate physics feedbacks in addition to badass sounds and enemies, all reacting realistically to your punches.


ü¶æMOD KIT Support coming soon...
data.about_the_game:
UltrasClash V is a physics based, fast paced, high octane anime combat!!! Fight hordes of hostile and powerful enemies like cactus head policemen, stupid minionsand giant dinosaur in a desperate, yet unmistakably hilarious, fight for survival.

In Ultrasclash V the combat is limited only by your own creativity. Choose your fighting style, choose your weapons, chose you powers. Be the powerful fighter you always dreamed of becoming!

STORY
The world is destroyed by a cataclysm: the only thing left is the tower-stadium called Motivatower. Only the one who reach the top will obtain any wish, save the heroes to let help your way!


FEATURES
üëäPunch Movement System: we created a VR locomotion system which allows you to roam the map using your fists, punching in the direction you choose to move to!


‚ö°Ô∏èSpecial Attacks: Charge up your aura to full power and unleash devastating finishing moves.


‚òÑÔ∏èPhysical engine: we bring you accurate physics feedbacks in addition to badass sounds and enemies, all reacting realistically to your punches.


ü¶æMOD KIT Support coming soon...
data.short_description: UltrasClash V is a sandbox anime action game, designed and primed to bring you a unique and creative approach to being a hero and unleash all your super powers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
